data.actual_result: You are redirected to an empty server with no channels, no name... Also when you try to open the 3 dots menu (where you can usually find notification settings, leave server, etc), the menu only appears for a split second
data.expected_result: It should behave the same as if you were kicked from the server: you will be redirected to your friends list screen
data.short_description: When the server you are currently viewing gets suddenly unavailable because of an outage, you will be redirected to a "ghost" server with no channels and no name instead of being redirected to your friends list
data.steps_to_repro: - View any server - Wait for it to be unavailable because of an outage (good luck...)
